Author: StressedCookie
Text: For me, I don't actually exercise because it takes tok much energy for me. But when I wake up, I take in deep breaths then I sit up. I contemplate if I want to get out of bed, be sleepy for a while, then realize I'm alrealy sitting up so I get out of bed. It doesn"t work for everyone.  How about placing your phone across the room so you actually need to get up and get it?
